alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 20 at 11:24AM AKST until January 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Skagway and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may reduce visibilities down to one half mile. Wind chills around 50 below zero are expected to continue through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
